00046 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00049 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00050 void InboxListItem::readFromStream
00051     (
00052     std::istream &aStream
00053     )
00054 {
00055     int             i;
00056     int             num;
00057     char            dummy;
00058     uint8           idSize;
00059     uint8           id[16];
00060 
00061     i = 0;
00062     aStream >> num;
00063     idSize = (uint8)num;
00064     aStream >> dummy;    // ignore '-' inserted between id size and id
00065     memset( id, 0, 16 );
00066     while( aStream.peek() != '\n' && !aStream.eof() )
00067     {
00068         aStream >> num;
00069         aStream >> dummy; //ignore',' inserted between chars of id
00070         if( i < 16 )
00071             id[i++] = (uint8)num;
00072     }
00073     aStream >> dummy; // ignore '\n' inserted after item
00074     messageId = MessageId( idSize, id );
00075     mIsValid = TRUE;
00076 }
00077 
00078 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00082 void InboxListItem::writeToStream
00083     (
00084     std::ofstream & aStream
00085     )
00086 {
00087     const uint8 * id = messageId.getId();
00088 
00089     aStream << messageId.getIdSize() << '-';
00090     for( int i = 0; i < messageId.getIdSize(); i++ )
00091     {
00092         aStream << id[i] << ',';
00093     }
00094     aStream << '\n';
00095 }
